text_block_list.text:
Sakura Bakushin O is now ready 
to take on the Sprinter's Stakes 
for a second time.

In the waiting room before the race, 
there was something going on that 
I didn't quite understand.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Yes! Ms. Flower, stop right there!

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Okay…?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Please do wait a moment. 
I'm thinking a little right now!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Errm, well, in this case… Mumblemumblemumble.

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text:
Um, Ms. Bakushin O's Trainer. 
What's the meaning of all this…?

Sakura Bakushin O suddenly ran out of
the waiting room and pulled Nishino
Flower with her. I'm sure she has some
sort of agenda…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: It's ready!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ms. Flower!!

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Yes?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
From now on, I'm declaring you chief 
advisor to the class president!!

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Chief… advisor?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
What's this!? 
My message wasn't received!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ah, yes, that! 
I declare victory!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I swear to you that I will run fair and 
square in this Sprinter's Stakes and 
best you outright!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
And… with this victory, I'll prove 
just how much I've grown!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
So, Ms. Flower, please allow me to 
race against such a skilled Uma as you!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Allow this Class Stayer, who 
ran the whole 3600 meters!

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Class Stayer…?

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text:
Um, anyway, with all I can, 
I'll do my best, too!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Certainly!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Now, let's fight like we always do!

Thanking the kind Nishino Flower, 
I sent Sakura Bakushin O off.
